row.process: ! --------------------------------------------- :SET &MANDANT# = '&MANDANTEN#' :SET &GEN_BESCHREIBUNG# = 'RZBatchKSM_Gener' :SET &PROGRAM# = '&PROG_LC#' :SET &INIFILE# = '&PROGRAM#.ini' :SET &OPTIONS# = '&INIFILE#' :SET &LOGFILE# = '&LOGDIR#/&GEN_BESCHREIBUNG#.log' :SET &DATFILE# = '&DATDIR#/sofortbegrente_&TS#.dat' :SET &DATFILE2# = '&DATDIR#/aufgeschobrente_&TS#.dat' ! --------------------------------------------- :PUT_ATT ARCHIVE_KEY1 = "Mandant: &MANDANT#" :PUT_ATT ARCHIVE_KEY2 = "Verarb: &POLICIERUNG_BIS#/&ZIELJAHR#" ! --------------------------------------------- cat << __EOF__ |tee &RUNDIR#/&INIFILE# VALUTA_ANF = &VALUTA_ANF# VALUTA_MAX = &VALUTA_MAX# DATUM_POL = &POLICIERUNG_BIS# ZIELJAHR = &ZIELJAHR# AUSW_MON_VON = &AUSW_MON_VON# AUSW_MON_BIS = &AUSW_MON_BIS# DATFILE = &DATFILE# DATFILE2 = &DATFILE2# TRACE = &TRACE# PROT_VTR_FILTER = &PROT_VTR_FILTER_GEN# PROT_MSG_TYPE = &PROT_MSG_TYPE_GEN# MANDANT = &MANDANT# BESCHREIBUNG = &GEN_BESCHREIBUNG# LOGFILE = &LOGFILE# __EOF__ ! --------------------------------------------- :IF &UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST# = "J" echo 'Test &PROGRAM# &TS#' > &WORKDIR#/&PROGRAM#_&TS#_1.out :ENDIF ! --------------------------------------------- !starten Anwendung :INC JOBI.STANDARDJOB ! ---------------------------------------------
